messages.title: Three Great Reasons to vote for Sadik Chaudhury
messages.content: 1. Sadik is not a career politician but a family man with young children, who joined the family business at 16. He is now a mature student at the University of Northampton. 2. Liberal Democrats are committed to investing in new transport links, more affordable housing, our schools and colleges, flood prevention and energy conservation. As our M.P., Sadik will fight for Northampton to get its share of government funding. 3. Northampton South needs an M.P. with Sadik's background, someone who understands the concerns of ordinary people.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Finish the job of balancing the books, on time and fairly. Cut Income Tax by a further £400 for ordinary workers.
Guarantee mental health equality by increasing health spending by £8bn a year.
Protect education spending from cradle to college.

issues.economy: Cut the deficit by half, reducing borrowing by £3,000 for every household in Britain. Given an £800 tax cut to low and middle-income workers. Cut Income Tax by a further £400 for ordinary workers.
issues.education: Provided an extra £2.5bn a year for struggling schools. Protect education spending from cradle to college.
issues.health: Increased the health budget each year to improve services and deliver 6,000 more doctors. Guarantee mental health equality by increasing health spending by £8bn a year.

housing.content: Liberal Democrats are committed to investing in more affordable housing.

leaflet.personalStatement: Sadik is not a career politician but a family man with young children, who joined the family business at 16. He is now a mature student at the University of Northampton.

contactInformation.address: Northampton Lib Dems, 120-126 Kingsley Park Terrace, Northampton NN2 7HJ

images.caption: Sadik Chaudhury, A Record of Delivery. A Promise of More.
